body.p: At the start of this procedure, Source 1 is assumed the active power source. Refer to the STS Monitorâ€™s One-Line mimic on the STS Home screen to verify that Source 1 (SCR 1) is powering the load.

If going to bypass on Bypass Source 1:
Turn OFF (open) Source 2 and lock out. (This ensures that the source on the opposite side is not active while Bypass 1 is active.)
Turn ON (close) Bypass Source 1. (Bypass Source 1 and 2 cannot be active together. The bar on the dead front panels prevents you removing both Bypass 1 and Bypass 2 keys at once.)
Turn OFF (open) Source 1 and lock out.
Turn OFF (open) the Isolation MCCBs or MCSWs.
